Articles.Content: I heard about this game a long time ago when there was no playable version available to me, and forgot about it. I was reminded a few days ago when I happened to see someone reference the latest version on an unrelated forum. I can't remember the last time I had more fun playing a video game. There seem to be some bugs, the career mode needs specific goals, things are generally a little confusing and the process of entering into the game feels entirely incomplete, or even un-implemented. None of that, in the least, takes away from the fun of a game that allows you to... well you all know what it does. It is wonderful. Thank you.
The game feels incomplete and has some bugs because it IS incomplete and not yet de-bugged. But it just keeps getting better as development progresses.

None of that, in the least, takes away from the fun of a game that allows you to...

Ooh ooh. Fill in the blank! I complete the sentence with...

... sling a kerbal out at high speed with a 30-meter long space station arm on full rotate.

Edited October 20, 2013 by Xacktar
